MonsterTrait.Name: Limited Amphibiousness
MonsterTrait.Text: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

MonsterTrait.Name: Shark Telepathy
MonsterTrait.Text: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claws
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Spear
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
